subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: England batsman Jos Buttler was the victim of a rarely enforced rule when he was run out while leaving the crease at the nonstriker’s end in a one-day game against Sri Lanka.
snippet: England batsman Jos Buttler was the victim of a rarely enforced rule when he was run out while leaving the crease at the nonstriker’s end in a one-day game against Sri Lanka.
